clinical_study.brief_title: High Doses Vitamin C and Tissular Repair in Surgical Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of High Doses of Vitamin C on the Tissular Reparation (Healing) in Patients Under Surgery in the "Hospital de Los Valles".

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, randomize, double-blind, and placebo-controlled study to evaluate in patients with clinical criteria for any of the following open surgical procedure: (1) cesarean section; (2) aesthetic surgery like abdominoplasty; (3) orthopedic surgery; and (4) abdominal open surgery [excluding laparoscopic procedures] will be invited to receive either a high dose of vitamin C (12.5 g) three times (48 h pre-surgery, immediately before surgery and 48 h post-surgery) or its placebo, to evaluate the tissue repair process using an international validated instrument named Patient and Observer Scar Assessment Scale.

primary_outcome.time_frame: initial assessment, two weeks after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Patient and Observer Scar Assessment Scale (it evaluates in a 0 to 10 scale: vascularity, pigmentation, thickness, relief, pliability and surface area)

primary_outcome.time_frame: second assessment, one month after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Patient and Observer Scar Assessment Scale (it evaluates in a 0 to 10 scale: vascularity, pigmentation, thickness, relief, pliability and surface area)

primary_outcome.time_frame: third assessment, three months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Patient and Observer Scar Assessment Scale (it evaluates in a 0 to 10 scale: vascularity, pigmentation, thickness, relief, pliability and surface area)

arm_group.description: i.v. infusion of 12.5 g vitamin C 48 h before surgery, immediately before surgery, and 48 h after surgery
i.v. infusion of placebo 48 h before surgery, immediately before surgery, and 48 h after surgery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Older than 18 years.
- Susceptible for any of the following surgical procedures: (1) cesarean section; (2) aesthetic abdominal plastic surgery; (3) orthopedic prosthetic replacement surgery
- Voluntary consent to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known allergy to the vitamin C
- Known problems with wounds healing
- Kidney disease (including lithiasis) or gout
